properties.Name: ServiceRequestReason
properties.Description:
A request for services made by a party.

A Service Request may be addressed immediately or require additional activity(s) or Service Request Activity(s).

Both Service Request(s) and Service Request Activity(s) involve one or more parties of various types and responsibilities and may incur costs that are charged internally or to the party.

A Service Request may be raised to an Issue if it can not be resolved or required higher visibility.

Columns.Name: ServiceRequestId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Service Request.

Columns.Name: ServiceRequestReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Service Request Reason.

Columns.Name: OrderLineNumber
Columns.Description: The number that identifies the Order Line Item.

Columns.Name: ServiceRequestReasonNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the service request reason.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountEventTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Account Event Type.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountEventTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the customer account event.

Columns.Name: DocumentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Document.

Columns.Name: MarketingProgramId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Program.

Columns.Name: ProgramParticipationStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Program Participation Status.

Columns.Name: CustomerAccountProgramStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date of the Customer Account's participation in a Program.

Columns.Name: TransactionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Transaction.

Columns.Name: TransactionLineItemId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier that identifies the Transaction Line Item.

Columns.Name: PaymentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment.

Columns.Name: ShipmentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Shipment.

Columns.Name: ChannelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Channel.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: MarketingEventId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Event.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingEventId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Advertising Event.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Advertising Campaign.

Columns.Name: OrganizationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an organization.

Columns.Name: BusinessProcessId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Business Process.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: OrderId
Columns.Description: The unique number that identifies an Order.

Properties.Description:
A request for services made by a party.

A Service Request may be addressed immediately or require additional activity(s) or Service Request Activity(s).

Both Service Request(s) and Service Request Activity(s) involve one or more parties of various types and responsibilities and may incur costs that are charged internally or to the party.

A Service Request may be raised to an Issue if it can not be resolved or required higher visibility.
